name: Buggy Cards
description:
A buglike card roguelike where you get given a hand of bug cards to defeat the enemy heart. First time trying to make a card game and it turned out alright.

Best played in fullscreen

You want a mix of attacker and defender cards in your deck

Attack cards will spawn a unit which walks towards the enemy heart and attack it, tho they will target defence units over the heart.

 Defence cards spawn a unit that stands at your side of the board if an enemy attacker approaches they will then try to kill em so the heart stays healthy.

You can at max have 5 cards in your hand.

Drag them to the trash to open your hand up and get half the cards value in bugcoin.
